text: (upbeat music)
- I'm Thamizhinian Chandran.

I'm working as a System
Development Engineer at AWS.
So I belong to APN Partner Network.
The primary work is to help the partners

to load the opportunities
and details into system
and communicate with the internal AWS team
and with AWS sales team as well.
(upbeat music)

So our partners is
spread all over the world

from small teams, small
companies to large,
various large scale companies,

trying to build AWS services
for their customers.
That data gets into our partner network

and the internal team will
work on those opportunities.
And then the partners will implement
those services for the customers.
(upbeat music)

We always go over and
beyond for the customers.

We try to understand
what is their pain points

and we try to address those
certain things at a faster pace.
And also we try to reinvent
something out of the box for them,
so that we get the wow factor from them.
We need the wow factor from them.

So we would try to
reinvent and simplify this,
how their use cases are there,
how they load on the system and how they
process things on the system.
(upbeat music)
Joining this team and being with this team
for seven months I am feeling happy that I
took the right decision and I know where

I'm going towards and where my
career path is going towards.
(upbeat music)

The one thing I love,
which I didn't expect,

is the collaboration among the
team members that I've been.

We work as a team, think
big for the customers,

and we help each other
and assist each other
and they do their work.
(upbeat music)

If you are a person who
likes to love challenges
and if you want to grow in your career

and build something for the
customers out of the box,

AWS Partner Network is a
place where you have to be.
(upbeat music)
